cab.content: (War Cabinet 27^ Minute 20).Copy bf Agreement signed by Representatives of the National Federation of general Workers. Skilled Time Workers (Engineers and Moulders) Order, 1917,AGREED that I2j$ on earnings be paid to plain time-workers, skilled, semi-skilled and unskilled, engaged in engineering and foundry trades on munitions work, who have not already re-ceived this advance under the order of October 13th.The same advancem or its equivalent to be paid to all plain time workers, skilled, semi-skilled and unskilled in the shipbuilding trades on munitions work.This increase shall apply only to time workers and shallnot be made a ground for a demand on behalf of men working onaysteme of payment by result or by the piece.(SGD) George Ih Barnes.1?: \.:. :hwrne. \7 it I- "cmdlie.2 *"i.cj; !i J3cvin* J, 1/ Gardner. JoLtza Gregory.James 0;Grady (Secretary).OfAices of the War Cabinet, 2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1,21st. November, 1917,
